程序包 org.giiwa.dao

类 MongoHelper

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.giiwa.dao.MongoHelper
  • 所有已实现的接口:
    Helper.DBHelper

    public class MongoHelper
extends java.lang.Object
implements Helper.DBHelper
    The MongoHelper Class is base class for all class that database access, it almost includes all methods that need for database
    all data access MUST be inherited from it

      • getDB

        public com.mongodb.client.MongoDatabase getDB​(java.lang.String database)
        get Mongo DB connection
        the configuration including: 
         mongo[database].url=
 mongo[database].db=
 mongo[database].conns=(50)
 mongo[database].user=(null)
 mongo[database].password=(null)
        指定者:
        getDB 在接口中 Helper.DBHelper
        参数:
        database - the name of database, if "" or null, then "default"
        返回:
        DB

      • getCollection

        public com.mongodb.client.MongoCollection<org.bson.Document> getCollection​(java.lang.String name)
        Gets the collection using "default", if the same thread required twice, then return same connection but reference "+1"
        the configuration including: 
         mongo[default].url=
 mongo[default].db=
 mongo[default].conns=(50)
 mongo[default].user=(null)
 mongo[default].password=(null)
        参数:
        name - the name of the collection
        返回:
        DBCollection
